** As a**  [role]
**  I need**  [function]
**So That** [Benefit]

### Details and Assumptions
* [ document what you know]

## Acceptance Criteria 

'''gherkin
Given [some context]
when [certain action is taken]
then [the outcome of the action is observed]
'''
